midfieldr 1.0.0.9013
  • MIDFIELD practice data

Add columns for race/ethnicity and sex

add_race_sex.Rd

Add variables race and sex from student to a data frame, using mcid as the join-by variable.

add_race_sex(dframe, ..., midfield_table = NULL)

Arguments

dframe

data frame with required variable mcid
...

not used, forces later arguments to be used by name
midfield_table

MIDFIELD student table, with required variables mcid, race, and sex

Value

A data.table with the following properties:

  • Rows are not modified

  • Columns race and sex are added

  • Grouping structures are not preserved

Details

Existing variables with the same names, if any, are overwritten.

Examples
